origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenBondAPI.get_latest_issues', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest green bond issues and related market analysis reports.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'issueType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of bond issue, e.g., green, social, sustainable.'}, {'name': 'analysisReport', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include market analysis reports.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'issues', 'description': 'The list of latest green bond issues.'}, {'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The market analysis reports related to the issues.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenBondAPI.get_latest_issues, 它的参数输入如下: 'issueType'是'green', 'analysisReport'是'true'.
